content: HAP 2.5 Hoist anchor plate Post-installed hoist point for temporary suspensions during installation and maintenance in elevator shafts (2.5. tons working load) ### Categories: Home > Products > Fasteners > Mechanical anchors- - - ### FEATURES:Features Built for one-person installation – weighing less than 7 lbs, this hoist point is much faster and easier to install overhead Compatible with PROFIS Engineering software – giving you a convenient method to design anchorage for the hoist anchor plate with wedge anchors or screw anchors according to ACI 318 and AC193 Large, rigid hooking area – hook point designed for easy engagement and to prevent swiveling loads Applications Temporary suspension of elevator cabins or equipment during installation or maintenance work in elevator shafts ### TECHNICAL DATA: Material, corrosion: Cast-iron, Multilayer coating Head configuration: N/A PROFIS Software: No Technical Data | Material, corrosion | Cast-iron, Multilayer coating | Head configuration | N/A | PROFIS Software | No ### ITEMS- 2292965 - Hoist anchor point HAP 2.5 (set of 2) - Package Size 2 pc Package Contents: - 1x HAP 2,5 Elevator hoist anchor point assy
